description: Can't pick? Don't blame you! Take your pick at them all with partial servings of each appetizer. Cal 520

name: Club Sandwich
description: A true staple. Lightly toasted white bread, sliced chicken breast, sliced turkey breast, fried bacon, lettuce, tomato, and GDG mayo. Cal. 700

name: Grilled Cheese
description: Your mom made it for you now we will too. Grilled white bread, your choice of cheese(pepper jack, chedder, American and colby jack). Cal. 500

name: Controversial Sandwich
description: Plain and simple. Hot dogs are sandwiches, try ours on a side-loading bun or a Patriots-style. Cal. 650

name: Healthy Option
description: Tossed to perfection. An iceberg lettuce based salad with carrots, tomatoes, raddish, sprinkled with cheese and dressed with your choice. Cal. 750

name: Big As Burger
description: Large and in Charge. 2 angus beef patties on a brioche bun. Topped with lettuce, tomato, onion ring, bacon and chedder cheese. Cal 1200

name: Football
description: A single angus beef patty served on a pretzel bun. Topped with lettuce, tomato, and chedder cheese. Cal 950

name: Steriod Burger
description: You'll need steroids to finish this. 3 large angus beef patties on a sesame seed bun topped with lettuce, tomato, onion ring, bacon, chedder cheese and GDG barbacue sauce. Cal 1700.

description: A slice New York Style Cheesecake. Simple yet delicious. Add strawberry sauce drizzle.(+$0.99) Cal. 450-500

name: Ice Cream not a Sandwich
description: Two homemade cookies with creamy vanilla ice cream between. Its technically not a sandwich. Look it up. Cal. 780

name: Spoonful of Sugar
description: Add a cherry on top of your meal. A vanilla sundea topped with chocolate carmel and strawberry sauce. If you're looking to be healthy, you might as well eat a spoon full of sugar. Cal. A lot
